sn43.1:2.1: Iti kho, bhikkhave, desitam vo maya asankhatam, desito asankhatagamimaggo.
sn43.1:2.2: Yam, bhikkhave, satthara karaniyam savakanam hitesina anukampakena anukampam upadaya, katam vo tam maya.
sn43.1:2.3: Etani, bhikkhave, rukkhamulani, etani sunnagarani. Jhayatha, bhikkhave, ma pamadattha; ma paccha vippatisarino ahuvattha. Ayam vo amhakam anusasani”ti.
